MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY20 postcode area of Machynlleth, affecting customers in Aberllefenni and surrounding area. Our engineers have established that there is a fault on the overhead line network following adverse weather conditions and that repairs will be complex so we are arranging generators to restore power, and this should happen by midnight. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.28PM on 21st January 2021
